tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geothermal_energy_project_dashboard (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    temperature FLOAT,
    power_generated INT
);

CREATE TABLE geothermal_energy_projects (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    total_cost DECIMAL,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE kpis (
    kpi_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    kpi_name VARCHAR(255),
    value DECIMAL,
    measurement_unit VARCHAR(50),
    project_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES geothermal_energy_projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_details (
   project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   project_name VARCHAR(255),
   location VARCHAR(255),
   start_date DATE,
   end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE kpi_data (
   kpi_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   project_id INT,
   kpi_name VARCHAR(255),
   kpi_value FLOAT,
   date_collected DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ProjectKPI (
    project_id INT,
    kpi_id INT,
    value DECIMAL(10,2),
    CONSTRAINT pk_ProjectKPI PRIMARY KEY (project_id, kpi_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_ProjectKPI_Project FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Project(project_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_ProjectKPI_KPI FOREIGN KEY (kpi_id) REFERENCES KPI(kpi_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MonitoringData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    kpi_id INT,
    value DECIMAL(10,2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Project (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    project_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE KPIs (
    kpi_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    kpi_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    target_value FLOAT,
    actual_value FLOAT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    task_description TEXT,
    task_priority INT,
    deadline DATE,
    completed BOOLEAN
);
